title: Lib Dem Leader Ed Davey Gifted £2,500 Gala Ticket by Fossil Fuel Firm
description:
Ed Davey, the leader of the Liberal Democrats, accepted a donation worth £2,500 from Viaro Energy, which drills for oil and gas in the North Sea, parliamentary records reveal. The donation took the form of a seat at Viaro’s table at the exclusive London’s Air Ambulance Charity gala on February 7th. Viaro Energy operates over […]

The post Lib Dem Leader Ed Davey Gifted £2,500 Gala Ticket by Fossil Fuel Firm appeared first on DeSmog.
